response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. We believe its value far exceeds the cost, making it an exceptional investment for you. Considering its worth to us and its relevance to you, we are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a discounted rate, tailored specifically for individuals like yourself. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 12000}
